 Trend Order: (0, 0, 0)
 Seasonal Order: (1, 1, 0, 12)
 Trend Parameter: ‘t’ (linear trend)
13.7 Extensions
This section lists some ideas for extending the tutorial that you may wish to explore.
 Data Transforms. Update the framework to support conﬁgurable data transforms such
as normalization and standardization.
 Plot Forecast. Update the framework to re-ﬁt a model with the best conﬁguration and
forecast the entire test dataset, then plot the forecast compared to the actual observations
